summary: Shōgun is an American TV series based on a 1975 novel by James Clavell. With a mostly Japanese cast and dialogue, it tells a historical drama set in Japan. The show premiered in 2024 on FX, with great success, winning 18 Emmys, including Outstanding Drama Series, a first for a Japanese-language show. With its impressive production and performances, Shōgun has been acclaimed by critics and set new records, with seasons 2 and 3 already in the works.
title: Shōgun (2024 TV series)
